body:
Not gross,  yall just retards
This shit top tier! Please translate 🙏
I'm glad I don't understand wtf is happening cuz this looks cursed af.
The story don’t make any sense, why the FMC friend is the only fcked? xD

@Atang, So teacher gets tricked into fucking this girl. The girl then invited her friend to be fucked as well. Girl then proceeds to take a picture of the teacher fucking the friend and blackmails him. In the process of blackmailing him, they are fucking. At that moment they got caught by a boy classmate. Teacher goes to jail. "friend" goes down a different path and becomes a cum dump. Nogiwa Kaede writes some pretty fucked up story. A lot of Loli doujins just have horrible endings.
Who the fuck fucking the other girl on chapter 3??
i uploaded this because i can't make sense of what the fuck is going on
